data.name: Tactical Intervention - Anniversary Terrorist Pack
data.detailed_description:
Terrorist Anniversary DLC Pack

Celebrating the first full year of Tactical Intervention's public operations this DLC offers Terrorist sympathisers an exciting collection of unique weapon skins, equipment and character skins.

This pack unlocks the following exclusive items:
  • DesertFox, Arctic, Snake and Bomber characters in custom outfits
  • Custom painted Remote C4 equipment item
  • Desert Digital camo skin for the Ak47 Rifle*
  • Woodland camo skin for the PDW SMG*

*Weapon items themselves are not included in this DLC package
data.about_the_game:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 7600 / ATI Radeon™ X800
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.6.6
  • Processor: 2GHz Intel Core Duo Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2400 / NVidia 8600M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
